title: Boss with Four Health Bars

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- You have four Hellbent health bars that can each take 5 damage as usual. Being hanged doesn't kill you and instead depletes your current health bar.
- If you've lost your first health bar, your attacks rampage.
- If you've lost your second health bar, your attacks are Overkill.
- If you've lost your third health bar, your attacks rampage again.
- You can attack an additional player each full moon.

desc:
Post 3445
*My sixth phase will surely end you!*
